@thejtlewis @realDonaldTrump FACT: The economy was growing well when Trump took office.
Trump did well not to screw that up for 3 years, and had he handled the Coronavirus intelligently (impossible for him) it would not have crashed!!! Not we're in trouble until we get a vaccine!!!
